mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (title, description, price, original_price, category, item_condition, status, seller_id, contact_way, item_location, image_urls, view_count, like_count) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{price}, #{originalPrice}, #{category}, #{itemCondition}, #{status}, #{sellerId}, #{contactWay}, #{itemLocation}, #{imageUrls}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, original_price = #{originalPrice}, category = #{category}, item_condition = #{itemCondition}, status = #{status}, contact_way = #{contactWay}, item_location = #{itemLocation}, image_urls = #{imageUrls}, view_count = #{viewCount}, like_count = #{likeCount}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM item WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM item WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY create_time DESC
